entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Alexandria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:19 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moose Creek Wells 01:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

Pressure / Tendency: 98.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -10.6°C

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
